response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs and expectations. It's truly a remarkable piece that I believe will add significant value to your life or business. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $11,500. This represents a substantial saving compared to the market value of $12,000. I'm confident this offer will be highly attractive to you, considering the immense worth of the product.
